rows.label: qst005604_msg001
rows.name:
Hi, I'd like to take out an ancient tome
about ancient floating tablets.

rows.label: qst005604_msg003
rows.name:
Yeah, there's this weird thin tablet
that floats in the air. We need to
know more about it.

rows.label: qst005604_msg004
rows.name:
Well, we do have one book that
might be relevant to your needs...

rows.label: qst005604_msg005
rows.name:
The only thing is, nobody has ever
been able to read it.

rows.label: qst005604_msg006
rows.name:
Don't worry! I should be
able to handle that!

rows.label: qst005604_msg008
rows.name:
Well...if I'm honest, it was pretty
difficult. I could only decipher
bits and pieces.

rows.label: qst005604_msg009
rows.name:
But I managed to get a string of
characters that seemed relevant!
It said "19A3".

rows.label: qst005604_msg010
rows.name:
I'm sure this has to be part of the
12-character code we're looking for.

rows.label: qst005604_msg011
rows.name:
If you found out that much,
that's all that matters.

rows.label: qst005604_msg012
rows.name:
Yep. We're getting closer to the day
when we unlock that tablet's secrets!
